head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TUCKER, THE REVEREND LUTHER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TUCKER, THE REVEREND LUTHER

block.p: TUCKER-The Reverend Luther. Beloved husband of Josephine Pullman Tucker, dear father of Mrs. Cameron Sanders, (Elizabeth), Mrs. Marcia Boogaard, Mrs. Robert Stoehr III, (Naomi), and Luther Tucker, Jr. Also leaves 10 grandchildren and five greatgrandchildren. Friday, July 21, 2000, at Old Lyme, CT. Time of services to be announced. If so desired, memorials may be made to the Indian Hill Church, 6000 Drake Rd., Cincinnati, OH 45243, Dwight Hall at Yale University, P.O.B. 209008, New Haven, CT 06520-9008 or the World Student Christian Federation, 475 Riverside Dr., 16th Flr., NY, NY 10015. For information contact Schaefer and Busby, Inc. Funeral Home, 24 West Ninth St., Cincinnati, OH 45202.
